settings.commandToExecute: powershell.exe Install-WindowsFeature -name Web-Server -IncludeManagementTools && powershell.exe remove-item 'C:\inetpub\wwwroot\iisstart.htm' && powershell.exe Add-Content -Path 'C:\inetpub\wwwroot\iisstart.htm' -Value $('Hello World from ' + $env:computername)
